summary: Tired of cow-punching for a living, two Montana cowboys rob a bank and flee but their employer's sons chase after them.

Dobbins|Bob Beck|Geoffrey Edwards|Herb Tanney|Bruno VeSota|Dick Crockett|Barbara Baldavin|Phyllis Douglas|Michael Haynes|Gloria Hill|Jay W. MacIntosh|Beatriz Monteil|Ed Parker
keywords: bank robbery|card game|u.s. mexico border|friendship between men|bar fight
title: Dos hombres contra el Oeste
